snippet: The tenor Andrea Bocelli offered operetta arias, carols and his ballad hits in a concert at the Barclays Center.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews performance by tenor Andrea Bocelli at Barclays Center.
lead_paragraph: The tenor Andrea Bocelli offered operetta arias, carols and his ballad hits in a concert at the Barclays Center.

headline.seo: Andrea Bocelli in Concert at Barclays Center
headline.main: With Some Help in Holding Up His Wings, an Angelic Singer Crosses Genres
headline.print_headline: With Some Help in Holding Up His Wings, an Angelic Singer Crosses Genres
